testprocedure.test-case-summary: This test procedure is called by a test case and is used to verify the SUTs support of the dlVideoSwitchStatusRequest dialog as an EC using variables provided by the calling test case. This procedure supports verification of requirements related to user need 2.3.6.3.3 [Need to Share Video Switch Status] and is used for both valid and invalid test cases.

testStep.functionId: Step 1 CONFIGURE: Determine the Application Layer Standard that will be used for this test. RECORD this information as: ApplicationLayerStandard: ${ApplicationLayerStandard}

Step 2 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Authentication is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.1.1.2.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N33R365_Authentication_Supported = ${TMDD_N33R365_Authentication_Supported}

Step 3 CONFIGURE: Determine whether External Center Organization is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.1.1.2.2). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N33R366_External_Center_Organization_Supported = ${TMDD_N33R366_External_Center_Organization_Supported}

Step 4 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Content of Device Information Request Filter is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.1.1.3). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N33R367_Content_of_Device_Information_Request_Filter_Supported = ${TMDD_N33R367_Content_of_Device_Information_Request_Filter_Supported}

Step 5 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Device Identifier Filter is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.1.1.3.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N33R368_Device_Identifier_Filter_Supported = ${TMDD_N33R368_Device_Identifier_Filter_Supported}

Step 6 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Roadway Network Identifier Filter is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.1.1.3.2). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N33R369_Roadway_Network_Identifier_Filter_Supported = ${TMDD_N33R369_Roadway_Network_Identifier_Filter_Supported}

Step 7 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Link Identifier Filter is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.1.1.3.3). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N33R370_Link_Identifier_Filter_Supported = ${TMDD_N33R370_Link_Identifier_Filter_Supported}

Step 8 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Route Designator Filter is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.1.1.3.4). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N33R371_Route_Designator_Filter_Supported = ${TMDD_N33R371_Route_Designator_Filter_Supported}

Step 9 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Linear Reference Filter is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.1.1.3.5). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N33R372_Linear_Reference_Filter_Supported = ${TMDD_N33R372_Linear_Reference_Filter_Supported}

Step 10 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Restrictions is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.3.1.2.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N33R407_Restrictions_Supported = ${TMDD_N33R407_Restrictions_Supported}

Step 11 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Unique Identifier of the Controlling Center is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.3.1.2.2). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N33R408_Unique_Identifier_of_the_Controlling_Center_Supported = ${TMDD_N33R408_Unique_Identifier_of_the_Controlling_Center_Supported}

Step 12 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Device Communications Status is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.3.1.2.3). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N33R409_Device_Communications_Status_Supported = ${TMDD_N33R409_Device_Communications_Status_Supported}

Step 13 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Operator Identifier is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.3.1.2.4). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N33R410_Operator_Identifier_Supported = ${TMDD_N33R410_Operator_Identifier_Supported}

Step 14 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Event Identifier is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.3.1.2.5). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N33R411_Event_Identifier_Supported = ${TMDD_N33R411_Event_Identifier_Supported}

Step 15 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Event Response Plan is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.3.1.2.6). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N33R412_Event_Response_Plan_Supported = ${TMDD_N33R412_Event_Response_Plan_Supported}

Step 16 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Status Date and Time Change Information is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.3.1.2.7). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N33R413_Status_Date_and_Time_Change_Information_Supported = ${TMDD_N33R413_Status_Date_and_Time_Change_Information_Supported}
Step 17 CONFIGURE: Define the response message that will be sent to the SUT. RECORD this information as: ResponseMessage: ${ResponseMessage}
Step 18 CONFIGURE: Determine whether the Authentication parameters need to be verified within this test. RECORD this information as: AuthenticationCheck: ${AuthenticationCheck}
Step 19 CONFIGURE: Identify the Username expected for authentication during this test. RECORD this information as: Username: ${Username}
Step 20 CONFIGURE: Identify the Password expected for authentication during this test. RECORD this information as: Password: ${Password}
Step 21 CONFIGURE: Identify the Organization Identifier expected for authentication during this test. RECORD this information as: OrganizationID: ${OrganizationID}
Step 22 CONFIGURE: Determine whether the SUT will be allowed access to the information requested in this test. RECORD this information as: AllowAccess: ${AllowAccess}
Step 23 CONFIGURE: Determine whether an error response message is expected for this test. RECORD this information as: ErrorResponseExpected: ${ErrorResponseExpected}
Step 24 CONFIGURE: IF ErrorResponseExpected is true, determine the expected error code response for this test. RECORD this information as: ErrorTypeExpected: ${ErrorTypeExpected}
Step 25 CONFIGURE: Determine whether the SUT is expected to have valid data available for a response message in this test. RECORD this information as: DataValid: ${DataValid}

Step 26 REQUEST-RESPONSE-OC-RECEIVE with the following parameters: DIALOG=dlVideoSwitchStatusRequest AUTHENTICATIONCHECK = AuthenticationCheck USERNAME = Username PASSWORD = Password ORGANIZATIONID = OrganizationID ALLOWACCESS = AllowAccess ERRORRESPONSEEXPECTED = ErrorResponseExpected ERRORTYPEEXPECTED = ErrorTypeExpected DATAVALID = DataValid
Step 27 IF ErrorResponseExpected is not equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 27.1 IF TMDD_N33R365_Authentication_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 27.1.1 VERIFY that element authentication exists within deviceInformationRequestMsg
Step 27.2 IF TMDD_N33R366_External_Center_Organization_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 27.2.1 VERIFY that element organization-requesting exists within deviceInformationRequestMsg
Step 27.3 IF TMDD_N33R367_Content_of_Device_Information_Request_Filter_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 27.3.1 VERIFY that element device-filter exists within deviceInformationRequestMsg
Step 27.4 IF TMDD_N33R368_Device_Identifier_Filter_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 27.4.1 VERIFY that element device-id-list exists within each instance of deviceInformationRequestMsg.device-filter
Step 27.5 IF TMDD_N33R369_Roadway_Network_Identifier_Filter_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 27.5.1 VERIFY that element network-id-list exists within each instance of deviceInformationRequestMsg.device-filter
Step 27.6 IF TMDD_N33R370_Link_Identifier_Filter_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 27.6.1 VERIFY that element link-id-list exists within each instance of deviceInformationRequestMsg.device-filter
Step 27.7 IF TMDD_N33R371_Route_Designator_Filter_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 27.7.1 VERIFY that element link-designator-list exists within each instance of deviceInformationRequestMsg.device-filter
Step 27.8 IF TMDD_N33R372_Linear_Reference_Filter_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 27.8.1 VERIFY that element linear-reference exists within each instance of deviceInformationRequestMsg.device-filter
Step 27.9 IF TMDD_N33R407_Restrictions_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 27.10 IF TMDD_N33R408_Unique_Identifier_of_the_Controlling_Center_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 27.10.1 VERIFY that element center-id exists within each instance of deviceInformationRequestMsg.organization-information.center-contact-list.center-contact-details
Step 27.10.2 VERIFY that element center-id exists within each instance of deviceInformationRequestMsg.organization-requesting.center-contact-list.center-contact-details
Step 27.11 IF TMDD_N33R409_Device_Communications_Status_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 27.12 IF TMDD_N33R410_Operator_Identifier_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 27.12.1 VERIFY that element operator-id exists within each instance of deviceInformationRequestMsg.authentication
Step 27.13 IF TMDD_N33R411_Event_Identifier_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 27.14 IF TMDD_N33R412_Event_Response_Plan_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 27.15 IF TMDD_N33R413_Status_Date_and_Time_Change_Information_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 27.16 VERIFY that the values within the REQUEST message are correct per the TMDD standard and known operational conditions.

USER-VERIFY-MESSAGE.functionId: The User Verifies the message content

testStep.functionId: Step 27.17 CONFIGURE: Set OptionalContentVerified to True

Step 27.18 POSTCONDITION: REQUEST-RESPONSE-OC-REPLY with the following parameters: DIALOG=dlVideoSwitchStatusRequest OPTIONALCONTENTVERIFIED = OptionalContentVerified RESPONSEMESSAGE = ResponseMessage
